data.text: Yaa saba Israaʼel, dubbii Waaqayyo isiniin mormuudhaan, maatii ani biyya Gibxii baasee fide hundaan mormuudhaan dubbate kana dhagaʼaa:
Leenci tokko yoo waan adamsu hin argatin
Simbirri tokko lafa kiyyoon hin kaaʼaminitti
“Warri daʼannoo isaanii keessatti waan boojiʼamee fi  waan saamame kuufatan
“Waan kana dhagaʼaatii mana Yaaqoobitti dhugaa baʼaa” jedha Gooftaan, Waaqayyo Waaqni Waan Hunda Dandaʼu.
“Guyyaa ani cubbuu isheetiif jedhee Israaʼelin adabutti,
